ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Smoking is part of my self-image
Smoking is part of "who I am"
Smoking is a part of my personality
Smoking is a large part of my daily life
Others view smoking as part of my personality
Smoker Self-Concept Scale Score
Notes: Average of smoke_scs_1 to smoke_scs_5; High scores indicate that being a smoker is important to self-concept

ElementDescription: I am able to see myself as a non-smoker
It is easy to imagine myself as a non-smoker
Not smoking is "like me"
I am comfortable with the idea of being a non-smoker
Abstainer Self-Concept Scale Score
Notes: Average of abstain_scs_1 to abstain_scs_4; High scores indicate that becoming a nonsmoker is important to self-concept

ElementDescription: Drinking alcohol is part of my self-image
Drinking alcohol is who I am
Drinking alcohol is a part of my personality
Drinking alcohol is a large part of my daily life
Others view drinking alcohol as a part of my personality
Alcohol Self-Concept Scale (ASCS) Score
Smoking marijuana OR using cannabis is part of my self-image
Smoking marijuana OR using cannabis is who I am
Smoking marijuana OR using cannabis is a part of my personality
Smoking marijuana OR using cannabis is a large part of my daily life
Others view smoking marijuana OR using cannabis as a part of my personality
Cannabis Self-Concept Scale (CSCS) Score
Drinking is a part of my self image.
Drinking is part of ''who I am.''
Drinking is a part of my personality.
Drinking is a large part of my daily life.
Others view drinking as part of my personality.
